Test Name: Chromosome Analysis for Hematologic Disorders / COG Enrollment Testing
Specimen Type: Bone marrow aspirate or peripheral blood
Purpose: Detection of numerical and structural chromosomal abnormalities for diagnosis, prognosis, and Children's Oncology Group enrollment eligibility
Container: Heparinized syringe (bone marrow) or green-top heparinized vacutainer tube (peripheral blood)
Equipment: Centrifuge, CO2 incubator, light microscope with chromosome analysis software
